description: Detects a suspicious svchost process start
name: Suspicious Svchost Process
query: (process.executable:*\\svchost.exe AND (NOT ((process.parent.executable:(*\\services.exe OR *\\MsMpEng.exe OR *\\Mrt.exe OR *\\rpcnet.exe OR *\\ngen.exe OR *\\TiWorker.exe)) OR (NOT _exists_:process.parent.executable) OR (process.parent.executable:"") OR (process.parent.executable:"\-"))))
author: Florian Roth
